mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_account ( NAME, NICK_NAME, ACCOUNT_NAME, PASSWORD, PHONE_NO, APP_TYPE, APP_KIND, ALI_OPEN_ID, WX_OPEN_ID, HEAD_IMG, ENABLE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{nickName}, #{accountName}, #{password}, #{phoneNo}, #{appType}, #{appKind}, #{aliOpenId}, #{wxOpenId}, #{headImg}, #{enable}, #{currentAccountId}, #{currentTime}, #{currentAccountId}, #{currentTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, NAME AS name, NICK_NAME AS nickName, ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, PASSWORD AS password, PHONE_NO AS phoneNo, APP_TYPE AS appType, APP_KIND AS appKind, ALI_OPEN_ID AS aliOpenId, WX_OPEN_ID AS wxOpenId, HEAD_IMG AS headImg, ENABLE AS enable, CREATE_BY AS createBy, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, UPDATE_BY AS updateBy, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM biz_account WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.sql: ID id, NAME name, NICK_NAME nickName, ACCOUNT_NAME accountName, PASSWORD password, PHONE_NO phoneNo, APP_TYPE appType, APP_KIND appKind, ALI_OPEN_ID aliOpenId, WX_OPEN_ID wxOpenId, HEAD_IMG headImg, ENABLE enable, CREATE_BY createBy, CREATE_DATE createDate, UPDATE_BY updateBy, UPDATE_DATE updateDate
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM biz_account WHERE PHONE_NO = #{phoneNo} OR ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} LIMIT 1
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT ID FROM biz_account WHERE PHONE_NO = #{phoneNo}) existsPhoneNo

SELECT ba.ID id, ba.NAME name, ba.NICK_NAME nickName, ba.ACCOUNT_NAME accountName, ba.PASSWORD password, ba.PHONE_NO phoneNo, ba.APP_TYPE appType, ba.APP_KIND appKind, ba.ALI_OPEN_ID aliOpenId, ba.WX_OPEN_ID wxOpenId, ba.ENABLE enable FROM biz_account ba JOIN biz_account_extra bae ON bae.ACCOUNT_ID = ba.ID WHERE bae.APP_ID = #{appId} AND bae.WX_ALI_OPEN_ID = #{wxOpenId}
